Today, North Yorks is flat with 1 ft @3s SE swell and fresh 14 mph S wind; not producing. Tomorrow, similar conditions persist with 1 ft @5s SSE swell and 16 mph SW wind; still not working. Day after, the swell picks up slightly to 2 ft @4s SSW but is blown out by 27 mph SW wind; conditions remain poor. Best: none.
